name: Unicorn Magic
title: You've Found a Secret Place!
message: This page doesn't exist, but at least you found this cool unicorn 🦄

name: Lost Robot
title: Beep Boop! Page Not Found.
message: The robots searched everywhere but couldn’t find this page.

name: Spooky Ghost
title: Boo! This Page is Gone.
message: You’ve reached a ghost page — it vanished into thin air.

name: Coffee Break
title: 404 — Coffee Time!
message: The page took a coffee break. Try again later.

name: Sleep Mode
title: This Page is Asleep.
message: We couldn’t wake it up in time.

name: Under Construction
title: Page Under Construction
message: We’re working on it. Thanks for your patience!

name: Alien Zone
title: Whoa! Wrong Planet.
message: You’ve landed somewhere unknown. Not found here!

name: Missing Page Mystery
title: Clues Point to Nowhere.
message: Our best detectives couldn’t find this page.

name: Lost at Sea
title: Page Overboard!
message: It drifted off somewhere. We’ll keep looking!

name: Burnt Toast
title: Oops, Page Got Toasted!
message: This one’s burnt. Not much to see here.

name: Clean White
title: This Page Doesn’t Exist
message: You may have mistyped the address or followed a broken link.

name: Tech Gray
title: Error 404
message: The requested page was not found on this server.

name: Gradient Blue
title: Oops! Page Not Found
message: We couldn't find what you're looking for.

name: Corporate Classic
title: 404 Error — Page Not Found
message: It looks like the page you’re looking for has been moved or no longer exists.
